init_module.label: Reset the module
init_module.comment: Click this button to remove all previous versions settings and/or reset the current module settings.

key_test.label: Key in test mode
key_test.comment: Key provided by PayZen for test mode (available in PayZen Back Office).

key_prod.label: Key in production mode
key_prod.comment: Key provided by PayZen (available in PayZen Back Office after enabling production mode).

ctx_mode.label: Mode
ctx_mode.comment: The context mode of this module.

sign_algo.label: Signature algorithm
sign_algo.comment:
Algorithm used to compute the payment form signature. Selected algorithm must be the same as one configured in the PayZen Back Office.
The HMAC-SHA-256 algorithm should not be activated if it is not yet available in the PayZen Back Office, the feature will be available soon.

notify_url.label: Instant Payment Notification URL
notify_url.comment:
URL to copy into your PayZen Back Office > Settings > Notification rules.
In multistore mode, notification URL is the same for all the stores.

language.label: Default Language
language.comment: Default language on the payment page.

available_languages.label: Available languages
available_languages.comment: Languages available on the payment page. If you do not select any, all the supported languages will be available.

capture_delay.label: Capture delay
capture_delay.comment: The number of days before the bank capture (adjustable in your PayZen Back Office).

validation_mode.label: Validation mode
validation_mode.comment: If manual is selected, you will have to confirm payments manually in your PayZen Back Office.

theme_config.label: Theme configuration
theme_config.comment: The theme configuration to customize the payment page.

shop_name.label: Shop name
shop_name.comment: Shop name to display on the payment page. Leave blank to use gateway configuration.

shop_url.label: Shop URL
shop_url.comment: Shop URL to display on the payment page. Leave blank to use gateway configuration.

custgroup_threeds_min_amount.label: Disable 3DS by customer group
custgroup_threeds_min_amount.comment: Amount below which 3DS will be disabled for each customer group. Needs subscription to selective 3DS option. For more information, refer to the module documentation.

redirect_enabled.label: Automatic redirection
redirect_enabled.comment: If enabled, the buyer is automatically redirected to your site at the end of the payment.

redirect_success_timeout.label: Redirection timeout on success
redirect_success_timeout.comment: Time in seconds (0-300) before the buyer is automatically redirected to your website after a successful payment.

redirect_success_message.label: Redirection message on success
redirect_success_message.comment: Message displayed on the payment page prior to redirection after a successful payment.

redirect_error_timeout.label: Redirection timeout on failure
redirect_error_timeout.comment: Time in seconds (0-300) before the buyer is automatically redirected to your website after a declined payment.

redirect_error_message.label: Redirection message on failure
redirect_error_message.comment: Message displayed on the payment page prior to redirection after a declined payment.

return_mode.label: Return mode
return_mode.comment: Method that will be used for transmitting the payment result from the payment page to your shop.

registered_order_status.label: Registered orders status
registered_order_status.comment: Status of orders when payment is successfull.

capture_auto.label: Invoice creation
capture_auto.comment: Automatically create invoice when payment is successfull.

send_cart_detail.label: Send shopping cart details
send_cart_detail.comment: If you disable this option, the shopping cart details will not be sent to the gateway. Attention, in some cases, this option has to be enabled. For more information, refer to the module documentation.

common_category.label: Category mapping
common_category.comment: Use the same category for all products.

category_mapping.comment:
Match each product category with a PayZen category.
Entries marked with * are newly added and must be configured.

ship_options.label: Shipping options
ship_options.comment:
Define the PayZen information about the used shipping methods.
Name: The name of the shipping method (use 127 alphanumeric characters, accentuated characters and these special characters: space, slash, hyphen, apostrophe).
Type: The carrier type.
Rapidity: Select the delivery rapidity.
Delay: Select the delivery delay if rapidity is « Priority ».
Entries marked with * are newly added and must be configured.

standard_title.comment: Method title to display on payment means page.

standard_module_logo.label: Logo
standard_module_logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

standard_allowspecific.label: Restrict to some countries
standard_allowspecific.comment: Buyer's billing countries in which this payment method is available.

standard_custgroup_amount_restrictions.label: Restrict to some customer groups
standard_custgroup_amount_restrictions.comment: Define minimum and maximum amounts to activate this payment method by customer group.

standard_capture_delay.label: Capture delay
standard_capture_delay.comment: The number of days before the bank capture. Enter value only if different from PayZen general configuration.

standard_validation_mode.label: Validation mode
standard_validation_mode.comment: If manual is selected, you will have to confirm payments manually in your PayZen Back Office.

standard_payment_cards.label: Card Types
standard_payment_cards.comment: The card type(s) that can be used for the payment. Select none to use gateway configuration.

standard_use_oney_in_standard.label: Propose FacilyPay Oney
standard_use_oney_in_standard.comment: Select « Yes » if you want to propose FacilyPay Oney in standard payment. Attention, you must ensure that you have a FacilyPay Oney contract.

standard_card_info_mode.label: Card data entry mode
standard_card_info_mode.comment: Select how the card data will be entered.

standard_one_click_active.label: Payment by token
standard_one_click_active.comment: The payment by token allows to pay orders without re-entering bank data at each payment. The « payment by token » option should be enabled on your PayZen store to use this feature.

standard_one_click_title.label: 1-Click button text
standard_one_click_title.comment: The text to display on the PayZen 1-Click payment button.

standard_one_click_location.label: 1-Click button location
standard_one_click_location.comment: Select where to display PayZen 1-Click payment button.

standard_rest_settings.label: REST API SETTINGS
standard_rest_settings.comment: REST API keys are available in your PayZen Back Office (menu: Settings > Shops > REST API keys).

standard_rest_notify_url.label: REST API Notification URL
standard_rest_notify_url.comment:
URL to copy into your PayZen Back Office > Settings > Notification rules.
In multistore mode, notification URL is the same for all the stores.

standard_rest_theme.label: Theme
standard_rest_theme.comment: Select a theme to use to display embedded payment fields. For more customization, you can edit module template manually.

standard_rest_placeholders.label: Custom fields placeholders
standard_rest_placeholders.comment: Texts to use as placeholders for embedded payment fields.

standard_rest_attempts.label: Payment attempts number
standard_rest_attempts.comment: Maximum number of payment retries after a failed payment (between 0 and 10). Leave blank to use gateway configuration.

payzen_multi.label: PayZen - Payment in installments
payzen_multi.comment:

multi_payment_options.label: Payment options
multi_payment_options.comment:
Click on « Add » button to configure one or more payment options.
Label: The option label to display on the frontend.
Min. amount: Minimum amount to enable the payment option.
Max. amount: Maximum amount to enable the payment option.
Contract: ID of the contract to use with the option.
Count: Total number of payments.
Period: Delay (in days) between payments.
1st payment: Amount of first payment, in percentage of total amount. If empty, all payments will have the same amount.

other_payment_means.label: Payment means
other_payment_means.comment:
Click on « Add » button to configure one or more payment means.
Label: The label of the means of payment to display on your site.
Means of payment: Choose the means of payment you want to propose.
Countries: Countries where the means of payment will be available. Leave blank to authorize all countries.
Min. amount: Minimum amount to enable the means of payment.
Max. amount: Maximum amount to enable the means of payment.
Capture delay: The number of days before the bank capture. Enter value only if different from PayZen general configuration.
Validation mode: If manual is selected, you will have to confirm payments manually in your PayZen Back Office.
Cart data: If you disable this option, the shopping cart details will not be sent to the gateway. Attention, in some cases, this option has to be enabled. For more information, refer to the module documentation.
